body:
SELECT
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0004] / items[at0006] / value as phenotype_identifier,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0004] / items[at0007] / value as phenotype_present,
  a / data[at0001] / events[at0002] / data[at0003] / items[at0004] / items[at0011] / value as phenotype_description
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.phenotype_gel.v0]
  )
ORDER BY
  c / context / start_time / value DESC
